description:
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Note this course was just launched  less than 2 months ago and already has over 2000 students AND OVER 40+ GREAT REVIEWS. 

We are one of the top Udemy Instructors in the Personal Development Field. our courses have been taken by over 21,000 happy students from 159 Countries.

We have a thriving community in our course and we are actively involved and answer questions within 24h.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Have you been dreaming of or considering becoming a life coach? Or, are you a life coach that’s just getting started? Get your questions answered and feel confident launching your coaching business by enrolling in this Life Coaching 101 course!

This course is designed to provide a strong foundation of understanding, powerful tools, and coaching industry best practices to help you begin or grow your own life coaching business. It is a comprehensive introduction to the field of life coaching, the tools and methodologies used, processes and techniques for doing life coaching, and necessary templates and documents needed to get started.

This course is for you:

  • If you have a passion to help others improve their lives
  • If you are a counselor, life coach, speaker, teacher or other professional who works with people and you want to enhance the service you provide by offering life coaching
  • If you want more expertise and a greater understanding of the life coaching industry
  • If you want a step-by-step system and powerful tools with proven results
  • If you want to expand your credibility a/nd build your confidence as a coach


What will you learn and receive in this course:

  • Explore an industry synopsis and clear analysis of the coaching industry, how it differs from other modalities, and requirements for becoming a coach.
  • Evaluate the importance of understanding your biases, projection, and boundaries as a coach.
  • Set expectations with your clients including the roles of coach and client, commitment, honesty and confidentiality.
  • Explore options for your life coaching business, including how to structure your packages and sessions and selecting the right coaching niche.
  • Learn coaching processes and methodologies, including the intake process, general session outline, SMART goals, goal setting, and more.
  • Receive practical tools and techniques, including the Wheel of Life, overcoming fear of change, and tips such as confidentiality, brainstorming, and how to engage your clients.
  • Learn listening communication techniques, including active listening, paraphrasing, and empathetic listening.
  • Learn questioning communication techniques, including detailed lists of types of questions, examples, and when to use them.
  • Learn NLP and body language techniques, including how to develop rapport, mirroring, and anchoring.
  • Establish a powerful mindset for coaching, including learning how to get yourself in the right state and overcome your own fears.
  • Receive coaching forms and templates, including intake questionnaires, intake session outline, coaching agreements, and coaching code of ethics.
title: Life Coaching: A Complete Guide
